subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Carolina Panthers cornerback Ricardo Colclough was arrested Saturday and charged with driving while impaired in North Carolina. Colclough was arrested hours before the Panthers had to make their final cuts. Mecklenburg County jail records showed Colclough was being held on $1,000 bond. “We’re aware of it,” the team spokesman Charlie Dayton said. He declined further comment.
